New Records: Shohei Ohtani, Mookie Betts and Freddie Freeman started the game with consecutive home runs, the first time that has happened in the Dodgers’ 141-year history
Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit an inside-the-park leadoff home run for Arizona
Ben Casparius (1-0) pitched a scoreless eighth for the NL West-leading Dodgers' fourth straight victory
Evan Phillips retired the side in order in the ninth for his 18th save
Will Smith and Gavin Lux singled off Ryan Thompson to start the ninth
Kiké Hernández sacrificed the runners to second and third and Edman looped a hit into shallow right field against Justin Martinez to score pinch runner Chris Taylor and Lux
Post-Match Reflections: There was a lot of excitement in this building
It was a good game. We fought as hard as we could, we just came up a little short.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Carroll tied a Diamondbacks record by reaching base in his 39 straight starts
Lourdes Gurriel Jr. homered and drove in three runs for the Diamondbacks
